name: Slimy: The Slime
description:
Slimy: The Slime:

Slimy: The Slime is a 2D infinite platformer game. As you play, events will occur. There are platforms shrinking, blindness, spikes, and more.

Good luck!

PS: This is a development build because normal build is not loading.

HOW TO PLAY:

You can move with: A / D or ArrowLeft / ArrowRight.

You can jump with: Space.

PS²: There is a little tutorial in the game.

CREDITS:

Music: 

Evan King: https://www.youtube.com/c/ContextSensitive / https://www.context-sensitive.com/ / https://contextsensitive.bandcamp.com/
